summary: "Shaun of the Dead" is a 2004 funny zombie movie directed by Edgar Wright and written with Simon Pegg, who also stars as Shaun. Set in London, Shaun and his friends get caught in a zombie apocalypse. It's the first in a trilogy of films by Wright and Pegg. Inspired by their TV show "Spaced," the movie pays homage to zombie films by George A. Romero. Shot in London and Ealing Studios, it was a hit with critics and audiences, making over $38 million. It's known for its humor and has even been used to study disease control.
title: Shaun of the Dead
